headline: Zimmer (ZBH) Builds Robotics Growth Pipeline, but BofA Sees Limited Near-Term Upside
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings Inc. (NYSE:ZBH) is one of the best defensive stocks to invest in according to analysts. With a decline of around 14%, Zimmer’s YTD share price performance has been weak. Its management is focussing on reinvigorating growth, and in a bid to expand its robotics platform and its portfolio of navigation and enabling technologies, […]
